description: Email sent to new users when they register
subject: Welcome to {{ PlatformName }}!
body:
Dear {{ UserName }},

Thank you for signing up to {{ PlatformName }}! Dive in and explore the latest news from around the world. Happy reading!

Best,
The {{ PlatformName }} Team

description: Email sent to users when they need to reset their password
subject: Password Reset Request
body:
Hello {{ UserName }},

We received a request to reset your password. Click the link below to set a new password:

{{ ResetLink }}

If you did not request a password reset, please ignore this email.

Best,
The {{ PlatformName }} Team

description: Email sent to new users when they verify their email via otp email
subject: Verify Your Account!
body:
Dear {{ UserName }},

Please enter the following OTP to verify your email: {{ OTP_CODE }}. This ensures the security of your account. Thank you!

Best,
The {{ PlatformName }} Team

description: Email sent to new users when they verify their email via link verification method
subject: Verify Your Account!
body:
Dear {{ UserName }},

Please click the following link to verify your email: 

{{ VerificationLink }}

. This ensures the security of your account. 

 If you did not request a password reset, please ignore this email.

 Thank you!

Best,
The {{ PlatformName }} Team

description: Email sent for testing the email configuration
subject: Test Email from {{ PlatformName }}
body:
Test Email from {{ PlatformName }}

Dear {{ UserName }},

This is a test email sent to verify the email configuration of {{ PlatformName }}.

If you received this email, it means the email service is working correctly.

Thank you!

Best,
The {{ PlatformName }} Team
